                        NpcTrainer enemy,
                        boolean turboMode,
                        javafx.scene.layout.Pane teamBuilderPane)
        Starts battle in offline mode.

        enemy - object representing the enemy trainer
        turboMode - enables turbo mode if true, otherwise disables it
        teamBuilderPane - the pane from which the game is started from

      • startOnlineBattle

        public void startOnlineBattle(Player player,
                              OnlineTrainer enemy,
                              boolean turboMode,
                              javafx.scene.layout.Pane teamBuilderPane,
                              Enums.GameMode gameMode,
                              java.io.DataInputStream inputStream,
                              java.io.DataOutputStream outputStream)
        Starts battle in online mode
        Parameters:
        player - object representing the player trainer
        enemy - object representing the enemy trainer
        turboMode - enables turbo mode if true, otherwise disables it
        teamBuilderPane - the pane from which the game is started from
        gameMode - game mode in which the game should be running (either client or server)
        inputStream - input stream connected to enemy player
        outputStream - output stream connected to enemy player

      • battleLoop

        private void battleLoop()
        Function that is called every time a new turn begins. Keeps track of timers of effects and allows the player to make a choice after all initial checks are performed.

      • waitEnemyAction

        public void waitEnemyAction(TrainerAction playerAction,
                            java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        If run in offline mode, this method returns the action generated by the AI trainer. In online mode however, this method starts a thread that swaps information with enemy player about each trainer's action.
        Parameters:
        playerAction - action taken by the player
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • generateMoveFromTrainerAction

        private Move generateMoveFromTrainerAction(TrainerAction action,
                                           boolean player)
        Generates move based of the content of the trainer action. This fails if the move isn't attack related.
        Parameters:
        action - action taken by the trainer
        player - should be set to true if this action is being taken by the player, false otherwise
        Returns:
        generated move corresponding to input action

      • processEnemyPokemonSwitch

        private void processEnemyPokemonSwitch(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine,
                                       TrainerAction enemyAction,
                                       TrainerAction playerAction)
        Handles events occurring when enemy decides to swap Pokémon.
        Parameters:
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        enemyAction - action taken by the enemy, in this case should be always a swap
        playerAction - action taken by the player

        target - target of the selected item

                                 TrainerAction enemyAction)
        Handles enemy using items. Not implemented
        Parameters:
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        enemyAction - action taken by the player, this should always be USE_BAG_ITEM here

      • processEnemyNonMoveAction

        private void processEnemyNonMoveAction(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine,
                                       TrainerAction enemyAction,
                                       TrainerAction playerAction)
        Handles all actions performed by the enemy that don't involve using a move
        Parameters:
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        enemyAction - action taken by the enemy
        playerAction - action taken by the player

      • generateValue

        private int generateValue(int bound)
        Generates a pseudorandom integer. If this method is used in online battles by the client, the generated value is instead read from the server to maintain synchronization.
        Parameters:
        bound - upper bound (exclusive)
        Returns:
        generated value

      • battleTurn

        public void battleTurn(@NotNull
                       TrainerAction playerAction,
                       @NotNull
                       TrainerAction enemyAction,
                       java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)
        Starts turn when all actions are decided by both trainers. Determines the action order of the turn. This method should be called only once per turn.
        Parameters:
        playerAction - action taken by the player
        enemyAction - action taken by the enemy
        battleTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn

      • calculateEffectiveSpeeds

        private double[] calculateEffectiveSpeeds(Pokemon allyPokemon,
                                          Pokemon enemyPokemon)
        Calculates the effective speed of two Pokémon. This method takes into account all special conditions that can modify speed in any way.
        Parameters:
        allyPokemon - player Pokémon
        enemyPokemon - enemy Pokémon
        Returns:
        an array of length 2 that contains the calculated speeds

      • generateEnemyMove

        private Move generateEnemyMove(Pokemon enemyPokemon)

      • processEnemySwitchOut

        public void processEnemySwitchOut(Pokemon firstPokemon,
                                  Pokemon secondPokemon,
                                  Move secondMove,
                                  Enums.SwitchContext switchContext,
                                  TrainerAction enemyAction)
        Handles when the enemy swaps Pokémon in the middle of a turn. This may be caused by moves that initiate a switch after executing or by the previous enemy Pokémon fainting.
        Parameters:
        firstPokemon - Pokémon that attacks first in this turn
        secondPokemon - Pokémon that attacks second in this turn
        secondMove - move selected by the second Pokémon's trainer in this turn
        switchContext - context behind the switch, this should be either a Pokémon fainting or a switch caused by a move
        enemyAction - action taken by the enemy; it should be a SWITCH_POKEMON action

      • waitForEnemyPokemonSwapChoice

        private void waitForEnemyPokemonSwapChoice(Pokemon firstPokemon,
                                           Pokemon secondPokemon,
                                           Move secondMove,
                                           Enums.SwitchContext switchContext)
        Generates information about the enemy's next choice after fainting or using a Pokémon swapping move. If used during an offline battle, generates a swap choice and continues the turn. If used during online battle, creates a thread that waits for information from the enemy about which Pokémon is being sent out next.
        Parameters:
        firstPokemon - Pokémon that attacks first in this turn
        secondPokemon - Pokémon that attacks second in this turn
        secondMove - move selected by the second Pokémon's trainer in this turn
        switchContext - context behind the switch, this should be either a Pokémon fainting or a switch caused by a move

                              Move firstMove,

                              Move secondMove,
                              Pokemon secondPokemon)

      • initAnimationQueue

        public void initAnimationQueue(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> battleTimeLine)

        Parameters:

      • checkTwoTurnMiss

        private int checkTwoTurnMiss(Move move,
                             Pokemon target)
        Handles logic related to special interactions between two-turn semi invulnerable state. Some moves can bypass this state and hit the target. Sometimes it also increases the power of the move used.
        Parameters:
        move - move that has been used
        target - target in a semi invulnerable state
        Returns:
        0 if the move doesn't have any special interactions and misses, otherwise returns the damage multiplier that is to be applied to the move

      • processMultiturnMoveCompleted

        private void processMultiturnMoveCompleted(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> moveTimeLine,
                                           Pokemon user)
        Handles the end of executing a multi turn move (like Petal Dance or Outrage). Confuses the target. Stopping execution of the move on its last turn also triggers this effect.
        Parameters:
        moveTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        user - user of the multi turn move

        user - user of the multi turn move.

      • calculateMoveAccuracyModifier

        private float calculateMoveAccuracyModifier(Pokemon user,
                                            Pokemon target,
                                            Move move)
        Calculates accuracy modifier. The modifier is then applied to the move's base accuracy. The result is used in hit calculations.
        Parameters:
        user - user of the move
        target - target of the move
        move - move being used
        Returns:
        accuracy modifier

      • processBattlefieldConditionMove

        private void processBattlefieldConditionMove(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> moveTimeline,
                                             Move move,
                                             Pokemon user)
        Handles animation and logic related to moves that add battlefield conditions to the field. Compared to stat boost, they apply an effect that works on all allied party members. This means that switching out doesn't disable these effects.
        Parameters:
        moveTimeline - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        move - battlefield condition applying move
        user - user of the move

      • processWeatherConditionMove

        private void processWeatherConditionMove(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> moveTimeLine,
                                         Move move,
                                         Pokemon user)
        Handles logic and animation related to weather applying moves. If the weather that is being applied is already present, the move fails.
        Parameters:
        moveTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        move - weather changing move
        user - user of the move

      • useMove

        private java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> useMove(Move move,
                                                          Pokemon user,
                                                          Pokemon target,
                                                          boolean first)
        Processes using a move, as well as status effects or accuracy checks that might prevent from using it. This method should be called every time when calculating move effects, unless there is only interest in calculating move damage.
        Parameters:
        move - move that is being used
        user - user of the move
        target - target of the move
        first - should be true if the user attacks first, false otherwise
        Returns:
        list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        See Also:
        calculateMoveDamage(Move, Pokemon, Pokemon, int, boolean, int)

                                    Pokemon user,
                                    Pokemon target)

        user - user of the move that freed it
        target - the user of the binding move that was in effect

      • processStatUpApplication

                                      boolean userFainted,

        move - move that applies stat changes
        user - user of the stat change move
        target - opposing Pokémon, not always the target of the move because it can be directed at self
        userFainted - checks if user of the move has fainted
        secondaryEffectsImmune - true if target is immune to secondary effects and this move's stat change applying qualifies as secondary, false otherwise

        private void processSubStatusApplication(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> moveTimeLine,

                                         boolean secondaryEffectsImmune,

        target - opposing Pokémon, depending on the move it is not always the target

        first - true if the move was executed first, false otherwise

      • processStatusChange

        private javafx.animation.Timeline processStatusChange(Enums.Status status,
                                                      Pokemon target)

      • processStatChange

        private void processStatChange(java.util.List<javafx.animation.Timeline> moveTimeLine,
                               Move move,
                               Pokemon target,
                               boolean primary)
        Handles calculations and animation related to a stat change. Checks if the stat change that is being applied doesn't cross the limit. In battle stat changes range from -6 to 6 (both inclusive).
        Parameters:
        moveTimeLine - list containing all Timeline objects to be played during current turn
        move - move that changes a stat
        target - target of the stat change
        primary - should be true if this is the move's primary stat change, false otherwise

      • calculateMoveDamage

        private MoveDamageInfo calculateMoveDamage(Move move,
                                           Pokemon user,
                                           Pokemon target,
                                           int twoTurnModifier,
                                           boolean canCrit,
                                           int overridePower)
        Calculates the damage dealt by a standard damaging move. Takes into account all positive and negative effects than can affect move damage.
        Parameters:
        move - damaging move
        user - user of the move
        target - target of the move
        twoTurnModifier - modifier that is applied related to the target being in a semi invulnerable state
        canCrit - true if the move can deal critical damage, false otherwise
        overridePower - an override to move power, replaces the power defined in move data
        Returns:
        MoveDamageInfo object containing data about the move damage
        See Also:
        MoveDamageInfo

      • calculateTypeEffect

        private float calculateTypeEffect(Move move,
                                  Type firstTargetType,
                                  Type secondTargetType)
        Calculates the effectiveness of the move on the target.
        Parameters:
        move - damage move
        firstTargetType - first type of the target (with modifiers, if any)
        secondTargetType - second type of the target (with modifiers, if any)
        Returns:
        type effectiveness which multiplies move damage

      • calculateWeatherMultiplier

        private double calculateWeatherMultiplier(Move move)
        Calculates multiplier related to weather effects. Some weathers boost or dampen the power of certain moves.
        Parameters:
        move - move that is being used
        Returns:
        damage multiplier

      • switchPokemon

        public void switchPokemon(boolean ally,
                          int slot)
        Handles logic related to switching out a Pokémon.
        Parameters:

      • resetStats

        private void resetStats(Pokemon pokemon)
        Resets statistics that persist only when sent out. This is applied to newly switched in Pokémon to ensure they are properly reset.
        Parameters:
        pokemon - Pokémon whose in battle stats are reset
